text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6cb0726215519fe94103803e4aa77a355384bcf2|patch 8.2.0840: search match count wrong when only match is in fold>
patch 8.2.0840: search match count wrong when only match is in fold

Problem:    Search match count wrong when only match is in fold.
Solution:   Update search stats when in a closed fold. (Christian Brabandt,
            closes #6160, closes #6152)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0840: search match count wrong when only match is in fold · vim/vim@6cb0726
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0840: search match count wrong when only match is in fold · vim/vim@6cb0726
attachments.text: Problem: Search match count wrong when only match is in fold. Solution: Update search stats when in a closed fold. (Christian Brabandt, closes #6160, closes #6152)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/823654bc06c847af20967d41db32d592aba416cb|patch 8.2.0841: 'verbose' value 16 causes duplicate output>
patch 8.2.0841: 'verbose' value 16 causes duplicate output

Problem:    'verbose' value 16 causes duplicate output.
Solution:   Combine levels 15 and 16 into one message. (Christian Brabandt,
            closes #6153)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0841: 'verbose' value 16 causes duplicate output · vim/vim@823654b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0841: 'verbose' value 16 causes duplicate output · vim/vim@823654b
attachments.text: Problem: 'verbose' value 16 causes duplicate output. Solution: Combine levels 15 and 16 into one message. (Christian Brabandt, closes #6153)

patch 8.2.0844: text properties crossing lines not handled correctly

Problem:    Text properties crossing lines not handled correctly.
Solution:   When saving for undo include an extra line when needed and do not
            adjust properties when undoing. (Axel Forsman, closes #5875)

patch 8.2.0845: text properties crossing lines not handled correctly

Solution:   When joining lines merge text properties if possible.
